seedUrls.description: The list of seed or starting point URLs of the websites you want to crawl. The list can include a maximum of `100` seed URLs. Array Members: Minimum number of `0` items. Maximum number of `100` items. Length Constraints: Minimum length of `1`. Maximum length of `2048`.

webCrawlerMode.description: The default mode is set to `HOST_ONLY`. You can choose one of the following modes:
